title: Manchester Warehouse
shortDesc: Manchester Warehouse is a top-rated e-commerce website offering a wide range of products from fashion to home decor. Known for its user-friendly interface, fast delivery, and exceptional customer service.

title: The BedlinenCo
shortDesc: The BedlinenCo is the ultimate destination for luxurious bedding, pillows, and linens. Discover our premium collection of high-quality fabrics and designer styles to elevate your bedroom decor. Enjoy a comfortable and stylish sleep experience.

title: Banana Home
shortDesc: Banana Home is a site dedicated to providing you with all the information you need to make your home a comfortable and inviting place to live. From decorating and design tips to DIY projects and home improvement advice.

title: CD Power Renewable
shortDesc: CD Power Renewable site harnesses clean energy from wind and solar sources to power homes and businesses sustainably. Join the fight against climate change and switch to renewable energy today.

title: ACEAS
shortDesc: ACEAS site provides information and resources for consumers and property professionals regulated by the Council of Estate Agencies. Stay informed and stay compliant with the latest industry standards and regulations.

title: People's Association
shortDesc: The People's Association site is your one-stop destination for community events, activities, and volunteer opportunities. Connect with your neighbors and make a positive impact in your community today.

title: Ministry of Communication and Information
shortDesc: mci.gov.sg is the official website of the Ministry of Communications and Information (MCI) in Singapore. Stay updated on the latest policies, initiatives and events related to the communications and media industry in the country

title: National Heritage Board
shortDesc: National Heritage Board is a website dedicated to preserving and promoting Singapore's rich cultural heritage. Discover the history, culture and traditions of our nation through interactive exhibits, educational resources, and exciting events.

title: Public Service Division
shortDesc: Public Service Division website provides information about the role and functions of the Public Service in Singapore. Learn about the latest initiatives, policies, and opportunities for career development in the public sector.

title: Singapore Defence Technology Summit
shortDesc: Singapore Defence Technology Summit website is a platform for leaders in the defence and security industry to share insights, explore new technologies and collaborate on the development of innovative solutions for the industry.

title: Defence Science and Technology Agency
shortDesc: Defence Science and Technology Agency website is a trusted source for information on Singapore's defence research and development. Learn about the latest technologies and innovations that help keep Singapore safe and secure.
longDesc: The Defence Science and Technology Agency (DSTA) is a leading research and development organization in Singapore that focuses on enhancing the defence and security capabilities of the nation. The website of the DSTA is built using state-of-the-art technology that enables it to deliver high-quality content and information to users in a user-friendly manner.
technologies: Webpack, HTML/PUG, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript/jQuery, Bootstrap, Photoshop
